mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.report.BirtConfigurationException
mdException.label: BIRT Configuration Exception
mdException.description: BIRT report generation is configured incorrectly

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.report.DataSourceLimitException
mdException.label: Data Source Limit Exception
mdException.description: Report templates cannot have more than one datasource

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.report.DataSetLimitException
mdException.label: Data Set Limit Exception
mdException.description: Report templates cannot have more than one dataset

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.report.UndefinedTemplateException
mdException.label: Undefined Template Exception
mdException.description: A report template has not been defined for this saved search

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.report.UnableToGenerateCSVException
mdException.label: Unable To Generate CSV Exception
mdException.description: A report was unable to generate a dynamic CSV result set

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.report.UnsupportedDataSourceException
mdException.label: Unsupported Data Source Exception
mdException.description: The provided data source is not supported

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.report.QueryConfigurationException
mdException.label: Query configuration exception
mdException.description: The provided query does not contain all of the columns needed to generate this report

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.report.TemplateException
mdException.label: Template Exception
mdException.description: Template does not produce a valid report

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.entomology.ControlMortalityException
mdException.label: Control Mortality Exception
mdException.description: The mortality rate of the control collection exceeds 20%, thus the test is invalid
